name: Snowglobe - Fawaz Sabir
description:
This is the snow globe that I created for my game design course! Though it's not much of a globe... and there isn't any snow... however, I can safely say that it's still something I'm proud of! :)

To Navigate the scene:

Use the WASD keys to move around,  the space key to jump, and the mouse to look around.

Assets used:

 - Darth Artisan Tree Package

Textures were found using Google Images.
